LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.climatecontrol.label: Enable Centralized Climate Control support (requires game restart!)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.climatecontrol.descri: Enables cooling of shields with Centralized Climate Control pipes
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.redistheat.label: Enable RedistHeat support (requires game restart!)
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.redistheat.descriptio: Enables cooling of shields with RedistHeat duct work
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.general.heading: General
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootout.label: Enable shooting out
LanguageData.fd.settings.shield.shootout.description: Enables shoots originating within a shield to travel out of the shield
